"Skyball" - A new team sport that combines elements of basketball, and volleyball. Players wear jetpacks and play on a court with a net that is 20 feet high. The objective of the game is to throw a ball over the net to the opposing team's side of the court while.ers try to catch the ball and throw it back over the net before it touches the ground. The game is played with four players on each team and is won by the team that scores the most points.

"Splashball" - A water-based team sport that combines elements of basketball and soccer. Players wear helmets and mouthguards and play on a court that is divided into two halves by a net. The objective of the game is to score goals by kicking a ball into the opposing team's half of the court whileers areer trying to stop them. The game is played with four players on each team and is won by the team that scores the most goals.
